span.span: The module contains the procedures that are used to perform file, directory or folder, and system operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ChDir`函数更改默认目录，但不是在默认驱动器。The `ChDir` function changes the default directory, but not the default drive. 例如，如果默认驱动器为 C，以下语句更改驱动器 D 上的默认目录，但 C 仍保留默认的驱动器：For example, if the default drive is C, the following statement changes the default directory on drive D, but C remains the default drive: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#39)] 您可以进行相对目录更改为通过键入两个句点，如下所示：You can make relative directory changes is by typing two periods, as follows: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#40)] > [!IMPORTANT] > `ChDir`函数需要非托管的代码权限，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下执行。The `ChDir` function requires unmanaged code permission, which may affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅和。For more information, see and . ## Examples 此示例使用`ChDir`函数来更改当前目录或文件夹。This example uses the `ChDir` function to change the current directory or folder. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#41)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dir`函数支持多个字符的使用 (`*`) 和单字符 (`?`) 通配符来指定多个文件。The `Dir` function supports the use of multiple-character (`*`) and single-character (`?`) wildcards to specify multiple files. `VbVolume` 返回而不是特定文件名的驱动器卷标。`VbVolume` returns the volume label for the drive instead of a specific file name. 必须提供`PathName`第一次调用`Dir`函数。You must supply a `PathName` the first time that you call the `Dir` function. 若要检索的下一项，你可以后续调用`Dir`不带参数的函数。To retrieve the next item, you can make subsequent calls to the `Dir` function without parameters. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要正确运行，`Dir`函数需要并标志的要对其授予对执行代码。To run correctly, the `Dir` function requires the and flags of to be granted to the executing code. 有关详细信息，请参阅， ，并[代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see , , and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). `Attributes`参数枚举值如下所示：The `Attributes` argument enumeration values are as follows: |值Value|返回的常量Constant|描述Description| |-|-|-| |`Normal`|`vbnormal`|默认。Default. 指定文件而无需属性。Specifies files without attributes.| |`ReadOnly`|`vbReadOnly`|指定只读文件，以及文件而无需属性。Specifies read-only files, and also files without attributes.| |`Hidden`|`vbHidden`|指定隐藏的文件，以及文件而无需属性。Specifies hidden files, and also files without attributes.| |`System`|`vbSystem`|指定系统文件以及文件而无需属性。Specifies system files, and also files without attributes.| |`Volume`|`vbVolume`|指定卷标签;如果指定任何其他属性，则`vbVolume`将被忽略。Specifies volume label; if any other attribute is specified, `vbVolume` is ignored.| |`Directory`|`vbDirectory`|指定目录或文件夹，以及文件而无需属性。Specifies directories or folders, and also files without attributes.| |`Archive`|`vbArchive`|文件自上次备份后已更改。File has changed since last backup.| |`Alias`|`vbAlias`|文件具有不同的名称。File has a different name.| > [!NOTE] > 这些枚举所指定的 Visual Basic 语言并可以在任意位置而不是实际值在代码中。These enumerations are specified by the Visual Basic language and can be used anywhere in your code instead of the actual values. ## Examples 此示例使用`Dir`函数检查是否存在某些文件和目录。This example uses the `Dir` function to check if certain files and directories exist. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dir`函数支持多个字符的使用 (`*`) 和单字符 (`?`) 通配符来指定多个文件。The `Dir` function supports the use of multiple-character (`*`) and single-character (`?`) wildcards to specify multiple files. `VbVolume` 返回而不是特定文件名的驱动器卷标。`VbVolume` returns the volume label for the drive instead of a specific file name. 必须提供`PathName`第一次调用`Dir`函数。You must supply a `PathName` the first time that you call the `Dir` function. 若要检索的下一项，你可以后续调用`Dir`不带任何参数的函数。To retrieve the next item, you can make subsequent calls to the `Dir` function with no parameters. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要正确运行，`Dir`函数需要并标志的要对其授予对执行代码。To run correctly, the `Dir` function requires the and flags of to be granted to the executing code. 有关详细信息，请参阅， ，并[代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see , , and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). `Attributes`参数枚举值如下所示：The `Attributes` argument enumeration values are as follows: |值Value|返回的常量Constant|描述Description| |-|-|-| |`Normal`|`vbnormal`|默认。Default. 指定不具有任何特性的文件。Specifies files that have no attributes.| |`ReadOnly`|`vbReadOnly`|指定只读文件，除了不具有任何特性的文件。Specifies read-only files, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`Hidden`|`vbHidden`|指定隐藏的文件，除了不具有任何特性的文件。Specifies hidden files, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`System`|`vbSystem`|指定系统文件，除了不具有任何特性的文件。Specifies system files, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`Volume`|`vbVolume`|指定卷标签;如果指定任何其他属性，则`vbVolume`将被忽略。Specifies volume label; if any other attribute is specified, `vbVolume` is ignored.| |`Directory`|`vbDirectory`|指定目录或文件夹，以及不具有任何特性的文件。Specifies directories or folders, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`Archive`|`vbArchive`|文件自上次备份后已更改。File has changed since last backup.| |`Alias`|`vbAlias`|文件具有不同的名称。File has a different name.| > [!NOTE] > 这些枚举所指定的 Visual Basic 语言，并可以代替实际值在代码中任意位置使用。These enumerations are specified by the Visual Basic language and can be used anywhere in your code in place of the actual values. ## Examples 此示例使用`Dir`函数检查是否存在某些文件和目录。This example uses the `Dir` function to check if certain files and directories exist. summary.span: 当达到为进行 或顺序 而打开的文件的结尾时，此方法返回布尔值 。

span.span: Returns a Boolean value when the end of a file opened for or sequential has been reached.

returns.span: 当达到为进行 或顺序 而打开的文件的结尾时，为布尔值 。

span.span: A Boolean value when the end of a file opened for or sequential has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`EOF`以避免通过尝试获取输入文件的末尾而产生的错误。Use `EOF` to avoid the error generated by attempting to get input past the end of a file. `EOF`函数返回`False`直到达到文件末尾。The `EOF` function returns `False` until the end of the file has been reached. 使用文件打开以进行`Random`或`Binary`访问权限，`EOF`返回`False`直到最后一个执行`FileGet`函数不能读取完整记录。With files opened for `Random` or `Binary` access, `EOF` returns `False` until the last executed `FileGet` function is unable to read a whole record. 使用文件打开以进行`Binary`访问，请尝试通过文件使用读取`Input`直到函数`EOF`返回`True`生成一个错误。With files opened for `Binary` access, an attempt to read through the file using the `Input` function until `EOF` returns `True` generates an error. 使用`LOF`并`Loc`函数而不是`EOF`使用二进制文件中读取时`Input`，或使用`Get`时使用`EOF`函数。Use the `LOF` and `Loc` functions instead of `EOF` when reading binary files with `Input`, or use `Get` when using the `EOF` function. 使用文件打开以进行`Output`，`EOF`始终返回`True`。With files opened for `Output`, `EOF` always returns `True`. ## Examples 此示例使用`EOF`函数来检测文件的末尾。This example uses the `EOF` function to detect the end of a file. 此示例假定`Testfile`是一个文本文件，其中包含若干行文本。This example assumes that `Testfile` is a text file that contains several lines of text. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#62](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#62)]

summary.span: 关闭对用 函数打开的文件的输入/输出 (I/O)。

span.span: Concludes input/output (I/O) to a file opened using the function.

summary.span: 在文件 I/O 操作方面可为您提供更高的效率和更好的性能。

span.span: gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations.

summary.span: 有关更多信息，请参见。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileClose`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `FileClose` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：从文件使用 StreamReader 读取文本](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-text-from-files-with-a-streamreader.md)，[如何：使用 StreamWriter 向文件写入文本](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files-with-a-streamwriter.md)，和[演练：Visual Basic 中操作文件和目录](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/walkthrough-manipulating-files-and-directories.md)。For more information, see [How to: Read Text from Files with a StreamReader](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-text-from-files-with-a-streamreader.md), [How to: Write Text to Files with a StreamWriter](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files-with-a-streamwriter.md), and [Walkthrough: Manipulating Files and Directories in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/walkthrough-manipulating-files-and-directories.md). 如果省略`FileNumbers`，打开的所有活动文件`FileOpen`函数将关闭。If you omit `FileNumbers`, all active files opened by the `FileOpen` function are closed. 当您关闭已打开的文件`Output`或`Append`，最终输出缓冲区写入到该文件的操作系统缓冲区。When you close files that were opened for `Output` or `Append`, the final buffer of output is written to the operating system buffer for that file. 所有关联的缓冲区空间使用的已关闭发布文件。All buffer space associated with the closed file is released. 当`FileClose`执行函数，而其文件的文件的关联数字结束。When the `FileClose` function is executed, the association of a file with its file number ends. ## Examples 此示例使用`FileClose`函数来关闭文件打开以进行`Input`。This example uses the `FileClose` function to close a file opened for `Input`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#69](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#69)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尝试使用`FileCopy`函数上当前打开的文件，就会出错。If you try to use the `FileCopy` function on a currently open file, an error occurs. `FileCopy` 需要完全信任才能在本地驱动器上工作。`FileCopy` requires full trust to work on the local drive. ## Examples 此示例使用`FileCopy`函数将一个文件复制到另一个。This example uses the `FileCopy` function to copy one file to another. 在此示例中，假定`SrcFile`是包含数据的文件。For purposes of this example, assume that `SrcFile` is a file that contains data. Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Boolean, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 数据读入到其中的有效变量名称。

summary.span: 将数据从打开的磁盘文件读入到一个变量中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 与读取的数据`FileGet`通常写入到一个文件`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file with `FilePut`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数 (或指向的最后一个`Seek`函数) 中读取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 时从文件读取，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 form1.vb 的文件不可能的 Visual Basic 源代码文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGet`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与读取的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果变量是一个字符串，`FileGet`读取一个双字节说明符的包含的字符串长度，然后读取该变量的数据。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持固定长度字符串;在放到文件，则不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串，而无需描述符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是一个数组，可以选择是否要读取的大小和维数的数组说明符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在数组读取时，必须以匹配数组写入的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它与描述符写入数组时，您必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用说明符，大小和边界的数组传递到`FileGet`确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 个字节分配，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的 18 个字节：(2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 个字节的数据：(5 \* 10 \* 4).200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 只不过是元素之间没有空白，像每个读取时，单独读取元素的结构。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 加其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数的描述符：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于读取各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已中字符串的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件中读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the`FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

[!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 个字节分配，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的 18 个字节：(2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 个字节的数据：(5 \* 10 \* 4).200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 只不过是元素之间没有空白，像每个读取时，单独读取元素的结构。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 加其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数的描述符：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于读取各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已中字符串的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件中读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref char Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, char& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Char, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 数据读入到其中的有效变量名称。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 读取的开始位置处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节数（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: 将数据从打开的磁盘文件读入到一个变量中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详情，请参阅。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 与读取的数据`FileGet`通常写入到一个文件`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file with `FilePut`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数 (或指向的最后一个`Seek`函数) 中读取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 时从文件读取，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 form1.vb 的文件不可能的 Visual Basic 源代码文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGet`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与读取的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果变量是一个字符串，`FileGet`读取一个双字节说明符的包含的字符串长度，然后读取该变量的数据。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持固定长度字符串;在放到文件，则不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串，而无需描述符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是一个数组，可以选择是否要读取的大小和维数的数组说明符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在数组读取时，必须以匹配数组写入的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它与描述符写入数组时，您必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用说明符，大小和边界的数组传递到`FileGet`确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 个字节分配，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的 18 个字节：(2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 个字节的数据：(5 \* 10 \* 4).200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 只不过是元素之间没有空白，像每个读取时，单独读取元素的结构。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 加其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数的描述符：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于读取各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已中字符串的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件中读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 与读取的数据`FileGet`通常通过使用写入到文件`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数 (或指向的最后一个`Seek`函数) 中读取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 时从文件读取，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 form1.vb 的文件不可能的 Visual Basic 源代码文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGet`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与读取的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果变量是一个字符串，`FileGet`读取一个双字节说明符的包含的字符串长度，然后读取该变量的数据。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持固定长度字符串;在放到文件，则不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串，而无需描述符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是一个数组，可以选择是否要读取的大小和维数的数组说明符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在数组读取时，必须以匹配数组写入的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它与描述符写入数组时，您必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用说明符，大小和边界的数组传递到`FileGet`确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 个字节分配，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的 18 个字节：(2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 个字节的数据：(5 \* 10 \* 4).200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 只不过是元素之间没有空白，像每个读取时，单独读取元素的结构。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 加其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数的描述符：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于读取各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已中字符串的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件中读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

span.span: Reading from Files in Visual Basic

related.span: 写入文件 (Visual Basic)

span.span: Writing to Files in Visual Basic

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref double Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, float64& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Double, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 数据读入到其中的有效变量名称。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 读取的开始位置处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节数（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: 将数据从打开的磁盘文件读入到一个变量中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

[!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 个字节分配，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的 18 个字节：(2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 个字节的数据：(5 \* 10 \* 4).200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 只不过是元素之间没有空白，像每个读取时，单独读取元素的结构。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 加其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数的描述符：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于读取各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已中字符串的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件中读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref int Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, int32& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Integer, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 数据读入到其中的有效变量名称。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 读取的开始位置处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节数（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: 将数据从打开的磁盘文件读入到一个变量中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 与读取的数据`FileGet`通常通过使用写入到文件`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数 (或指向的最后一个`Seek`函数) 中读取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 时从文件读取，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 form1.vb 的文件不可能的 Visual Basic 源代码文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGet`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与读取的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果变量是一个字符串，`FileGet`读取一个双字节说明符的包含的字符串长度，然后读取该变量的数据。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持固定长度字符串;在放到文件，则不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串，而无需描述符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是一个数组，可以选择是否要读取的大小和维数的数组说明符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在数组读取时，必须以匹配数组写入的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它与描述符写入数组时，您必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用说明符，大小和边界的数组传递到`FileGet`确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 个字节分配，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的 18 个字节：(2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 个字节的数据：(5 \* 10 \* 4).200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 只不过是元素之间没有空白，像每个读取时，单独读取元素的结构。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 加其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数的描述符：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于读取各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已中字符串的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件中读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref float Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, float32& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Single, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 数据读入到其中的有效变量名称。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 读取的开始位置处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节数（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: 将数据从打开的磁盘文件读入到一个变量中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详情，请参阅。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 与读取的数据`FileGet`通常通过使用写入到文件`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数 (或指向的最后一个`Seek`函数) 中读取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 时从文件读取，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 form1.vb 的文件不可能的 Visual Basic 源代码文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGet`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与读取的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果变量是一个字符串，`FileGet`读取一个双字节说明符的包含的字符串长度，然后读取该变量的数据。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持固定长度字符串;在放到文件，则不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串，而无需描述符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是一个数组，可以选择是否要读取的大小和维数的数组说明符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在数组读取时，必须以匹配数组写入的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它与描述符写入数组时，您必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用说明符，大小和边界的数组传递到`FileGet`确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 个字节分配，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的 18 个字节：(2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 个字节的数据：(5 \* 10 \* 4).200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 只不过是元素之间没有空白，像每个读取时，单独读取元素的结构。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 加其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数的描述符：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于读取各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已中字符串的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件中读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref string Value, long RecordNumber = -1, bool StringIsFixedLength = false);
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, string& Value, int64 RecordNumber, bool StringIsFixedLength) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As String, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1, Optional StringIsFixedLength As Boolean = false)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 * bool -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 数据读入到其中的有效变量名称。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 读取的开始位置处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节数（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

param.name: StringIsFixedLength
param.span: 仅在写入字符串时适用。

span.span: Applies only when writing a string.

param.span: 指定是否为描述长度的字符串写入一个双字节说明符。

span.span: Specifies whether to write a two-byte descriptor for the string that describes the length.

如果读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGet`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与读取的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果变量是一个字符串，`FileGet`读取一个双字节说明符的包含的字符串长度，然后读取该变量的数据。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持固定长度字符串;在放到文件，则不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串，而无需描述符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是一个数组，可以选择是否要读取的大小和维数的数组说明符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在数组读取时，必须以匹配数组写入的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它与描述符写入数组时，您必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用说明符，大小和边界的数组传递到`FileGet`确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 个字节分配，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的 18 个字节：(2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 个字节的数据：(5 \* 10 \* 4).200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 只不过是元素之间没有空白，像每个读取时，单独读取元素的结构。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePut`) 加其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数的描述符：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于读取各个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组和其描述符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGet`只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已中字符串的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件中读取`FileGet`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref Array Value, long RecordNumber = -1, bool ArrayIsDynamic = false, bool StringIsFixedLength = false);
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, class System.Array& Value, int64 RecordNumber, bool ArrayIsDynamic, bool StringIsFixedLength) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Array, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1, Optional ArrayIsDynamic As Boolean = false, Optional StringIsFixedLength As Boolean = false)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 * bool * bool -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 数据读入到其中的有效变量名称。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 读取的开始位置处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节数（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

param.name: ArrayIsDynamic

span.span: Applies only when writing an array.

param.span: 指定是否将数组视为动态数组，以及是否需要描述数组大小和边界的数组说明符。

span.span: Specifies whether the array is to be treated as dynamic and whether an array descriptor describing the size and bounds of the array is necessary.

param.name: StringIsFixedLength
param.span: 仅在写入字符串时适用。

span.span: Applies only when writing a string.

param.span: 指定是否为描述长度的字符串写入一个双字节说明符。

span.span: Specifies whether to write a two-byte descriptor for the string that describes the length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 与读取的数据`FileGet`通常通过使用写入到文件`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数 (或指向的最后一个`Seek`函数) 中读取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 时从文件读取，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 form1.vb 的文件不可能的 Visual Basic 源代码文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGet`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the starting of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与读取的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持固定长度字符串;在放到文件，则不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串，而无需描述符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是一个数组，可以选择是否要读取的大小和维数的数组说明符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在数组读取时，必须以匹配数组写入的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它与描述符写入数组时，您必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用说明符，大小和边界的数组传递到`FileGet`确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 个字节分配，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的 18 个字节：(2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 个字节的数据：(5 \* 10 \* 4).200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FileGet`只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于所读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续; 从磁盘读取所有变量也就是说，而不填充记录之间。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGetObject`而不是使用函数`FileGet`以在编译时避免出现多义性，如果类型`Object`返回而不是另一种类型，如`Integer`， `Long`， `Short`，依次类推。The `FileGetObject` function is used instead of `FileGet` to avoid ambiguities at compile time if type `Object` is returned instead of another type, such as `Integer`, `Long`, `Short`, and so forth. 如果你想要将写出`Variant`类型，`FileGetObject`是必需的。If you intend to write out the `Variant` type, `FileGetObject` is required. 如果你使用某个对象作为第二个参数，如有疑问，始终建议你使用`FilePutObject`和`FileGetObject`。When in doubt, if you are using an object for the second parameter, it is always suggested that you use `FilePutObject` and `FileGetObject`. `FileGetObject` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGetObject` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 与读取的数据`FileGetObject`通常与编写`FilePutObject`。Data read with `FileGetObject` is usually written with `FilePutObject`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`，`FileGetObject`上次读取记录号或字节`FileGetObject`或`FilePutObject`函数 (或指向的最后一个`Seek`函数)。If you omit `RecordNumber`, `FileGetObject` reads the record or byte after the last `FileGetObject` or `FilePutObject` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function). ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果读取的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FileGetObject`读取的记录长度边界上的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGetObject` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the beginning of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能准确地确定填充的数据量，它是已记录的长度与读取的数据的长度匹配一个好办法。Because the amount of padding data cannot be precisely determined, it is a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 如果读入的变量是一个字符串，默认情况下`FileGetObject`读取一个包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后读取该变量的数据。If the variable being read into is a string, by default `FileGetObject` reads a two-byte descriptor containing the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本支持固定长度的字符串和读取到文件时，则不会写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings and when read to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果你想要读取的字符串，而无需描述符，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量为数组，则 `RecordLength` 函数中 `FileOpen` 参数指定的记录长度必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。If the variable being read into is an array, then the record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: 2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘：For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#27)] 分发了 218 个字节，如下所示：为描述符分发了 18 个字节 (2 + 8 \* 2)，为数据分发了 100 个字节 (5 \* 10 \* 4)。The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: 18 bytes for the descriptor (2 + 8 \* 2), and 100 bytes for the data (5 \* 10 \* 4). - `FileGetObject` 只不过是元素之间没有空白，像每个读取时，单独读取元素的结构。`FileGetObject` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型的动态数组 (使用编写`FilePutObject`) 加其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数的描述符：2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePutObject`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: 2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于读取各个元素，包括任何数组和其描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements, including any arrays and their descriptors. 类可应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The class can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，所有的`Random`规则适用，但以下情况例外：For files opened in `Binary` mode, all of the `Random` rules apply, with these exceptions: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGetObject` 读取所有变量从磁盘连续，也就是说，记录之间没有空白。`FileGetObject` reads all variables from disk contiguously, that is, with no padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FileGetObject`只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGetObject` reads only the data. 未不读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. `FileGetObject` 读取不是元素的结构不需要双字节长度说明符的可变长度字符串。`FileGetObject` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于已中字符串的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 时从文件读取，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 form1.vb 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 源文件。For example, a file named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## Examples 下面的示例测试文件中读取一条记录，然后检索它。The following example reads a record into a test file and then retrieves it. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#26)]

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileOpen`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `FileOpen` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 访问文件](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 可以对其执行任何 I/O 操作之前，必须打开一个文件。You must open a file before any I/O operation can be performed on it. `FileOpen` 对文件的 I/O 分配缓冲区，并确定要使用缓冲区的访问模式。`FileOpen` allocates a buffer for I/O to the file and determines the mode of access to use with the buffer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 写入到文件时，应用程序可能需要创建一个文件，如果尝试写入的文件不存在。When writing to a file, an application may have to create a file, if the file to which it is trying to write does not exist. 若要执行此操作，必须在其中创建文件的目录的权限。To do so, it needs permission for the directory in which the file is to be created. 但是，如果指定的文件`FileName`确实存在，应用程序需求`Write`仅对文件本身的权限。However, if the file specified by `FileName` does exist, the application needs `Write` permission only to the file itself. 可能的为了提高安全性，任何位置创建文件在部署和授予过程`Write`权限到该文件唯一，而不是整个目录。Wherever possible, to help improve security, create the file during deployment and grant `Write` permission to that file only, instead of to the whole directory. 为了提高安全性，请将数据写入到的根目录或 Program Files 目录而不是用户目录中。To help improve security, write data to user directories instead of to the root directory or the Program Files directory. 若要打开的通道可在使用`FreeFile()`函数。The channel to open can be found by using the `FreeFile()` function. > [!IMPORTANT] > `FileOpen`函数需要`Read`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举，它可能会影响它在部分信任情况下执行。The `FileOpen` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration, which may affect its execution in partial trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see enumeration. ## Examples 此示例演示了的各种用法`FileOpen`函数，以使输入和输出到文件。This example illustrates various uses of the `FileOpen` function to enable input and output to a file. 以下代码打开文件`TestFile`在`Input`模式。The following code opens the file `TestFile` in `Input` mode. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 此示例打开中的文件`Binary`进行只写操作的模式。This example opens the file in `Binary` mode for writing operations only. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 下面的示例打开中的文件`Random`模式。The following example opens the file in `Random` mode. 该文件包含的记录是结构`Person`。The file contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 此代码示例将打开的文件中`Output`模式; 任何进程可以读取或写入文件。This code example opens the file in `Output` mode; any process can read or write to file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 此代码示例将打开的文件中`Binary`模式进行读取; 其他进程无法读取文件。This code example opens the file in `Binary` mode for reading; other processes cannot read file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#9)]
