span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详情，请参阅。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或指向的最后一个`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是否将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数是不会写入长度说明符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您只需使用相同`FileGet`，您必须确保该字符串将初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续的记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入一个双字节说明符，包含字符串长度，然后写入该变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含一个数值类型的对象`FilePut`标识的两个字节写入`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，编写一个对象时包含一个整数`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储在变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`写入一个双字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少大于字符串的实际长度为四个字节。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入大小和数组的维数的说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件说明符有关的动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在编写数组时，必须匹配的方法将读取该数组;如果它将读取与描述符，您必须写入描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串字段大小超过指定值的字节`VBFixedString`属性将被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 所有将变量写入磁盘连续，也就是说，不带记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 不是元素的结构，无需两个字节的长度说明符写入可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数将数据写入到一个文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的五个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

related.span: 写入文件 (Visual Basic)

span.span: Writing to Files in Visual Basic

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, byte Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, unsigned int8 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Byte, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * byte * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效变量名，它包含写入磁盘的数据。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 开始写入处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节号（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 将变量中得数据写入磁盘文件中。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详情，请参阅。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或指向的最后一个`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是否将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数是不会写入长度说明符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您只需使用相同`FileGet`，您必须确保该字符串将初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续的记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入一个双字节说明符，包含字符串长度，然后写入该变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含一个数值类型的对象`FilePut`标识的两个字节写入`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，编写一个对象时包含一个整数`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储在变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`写入一个双字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少大于字符串的实际长度为四个字节。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入大小和数组的维数的说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件说明符有关的动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在编写数组时，必须匹配的方法将读取该数组;如果它将读取与描述符，您必须写入描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串字段大小超过指定值的字节`VBFixedString`属性将被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 所有将变量写入磁盘连续，也就是说，不带记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 不是元素的结构，无需两个字节的长度说明符写入可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数将数据写入到一个文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的五个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数将数据写入到一个文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的五个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

related.span: 写入文件 (Visual Basic)

span.span: Writing to Files in Visual Basic

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, DateTime Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, valuetype System.DateTime Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As DateTime, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * DateTime * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效变量名，它包含写入磁盘的数据。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 开始写入处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节号（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 将变量中得数据写入磁盘文件中。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详情，请参阅。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或指向的最后一个`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是否将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数是不会写入长度说明符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您只需使用相同`FileGet`，您必须确保该字符串将初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续的记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入一个双字节说明符，包含字符串长度，然后写入该变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含一个数值类型的对象`FilePut`标识的两个字节写入`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，编写一个对象时包含一个整数`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储在变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`写入一个双字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少大于字符串的实际长度为四个字节。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入大小和数组的维数的说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件说明符有关的动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在编写数组时，必须匹配的方法将读取该数组;如果它将读取与描述符，您必须写入描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串字段大小超过指定值的字节`VBFixedString`属性将被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 所有将变量写入磁盘连续，也就是说，不带记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 不是元素的结构，无需两个字节的长度说明符写入可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数将数据写入到一个文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的五个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, double Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, float64 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Double, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * double * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效变量名，它包含写入磁盘的数据。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 开始写入处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节号（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 将变量中得数据写入磁盘文件中。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详情，请参阅。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或指向的最后一个`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是否将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数是不会写入长度说明符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您只需使用相同`FileGet`，您必须确保该字符串将初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续的记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入一个双字节说明符，包含字符串长度，然后写入该变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含一个数值类型的对象`FilePut`标识的两个字节写入`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，编写一个对象时包含一个整数`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储在变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`写入一个双字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少大于字符串的实际长度为四个字节。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入大小和数组的维数的说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件说明符有关的动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在编写数组时，必须匹配的方法将读取该数组;如果它将读取与描述符，您必须写入描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串字段大小超过指定值的字节`VBFixedString`属性将被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 所有将变量写入磁盘连续，也就是说，不带记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 不是元素的结构，无需两个字节的长度说明符写入可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数将数据写入到一个文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的五个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或指向的最后一个`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是否将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数是不会写入长度说明符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您只需使用相同`FileGet`，您必须确保该字符串将初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续的记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入一个双字节说明符，包含字符串长度，然后写入该变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含一个数值类型的对象`FilePut`标识的两个字节写入`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，编写一个对象时包含一个整数`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储在变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`写入一个双字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少大于字符串的实际长度为四个字节。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入大小和数组的维数的说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件说明符有关的动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在编写数组时，必须匹配的方法将读取该数组;如果它将读取与描述符，您必须写入描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串字段大小超过指定值的字节`VBFixedString`属性将被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 所有将变量写入磁盘连续，也就是说，不带记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 不是元素的结构，无需两个字节的长度说明符写入可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数将数据写入到一个文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的五个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, long Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, int64 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Long, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * int64 * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效变量名，它包含写入磁盘的数据。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 开始写入处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节号（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 将变量中得数据写入磁盘文件中。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详情，请参阅。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或指向的最后一个`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是否将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数是不会写入长度说明符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您只需使用相同`FileGet`，您必须确保该字符串将初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续的记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入一个双字节说明符，包含字符串长度，然后写入该变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含一个数值类型的对象`FilePut`标识的两个字节写入`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，编写一个对象时包含一个整数`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储在变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`写入一个双字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少大于字符串的实际长度为四个字节。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入大小和数组的维数的说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件说明符有关的动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在编写数组时，必须匹配的方法将读取该数组;如果它将读取与描述符，您必须写入描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串字段大小超过指定值的字节`VBFixedString`属性将被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 所有将变量写入磁盘连续，也就是说，不带记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 不是元素的结构，无需两个字节的长度说明符写入可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数将数据写入到一个文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的五个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, ValueType Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, class System.ValueType Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As ValueType, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * ValueType * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效变量名，它包含写入磁盘的数据。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 开始写入处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节号（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 将变量中得数据写入磁盘文件中。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详情，请参阅。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或指向的最后一个`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是否将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数是不会写入长度说明符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您只需使用相同`FileGet`，您必须确保该字符串将初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续的记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入一个双字节说明符，包含字符串长度，然后写入该变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含一个数值类型的对象`FilePut`标识的两个字节写入`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，编写一个对象时包含一个整数`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储在变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`写入一个双字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少大于字符串的实际长度为四个字节。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入大小和数组的维数的说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件说明符有关的动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在编写数组时，必须匹配的方法将读取该数组;如果它将读取与描述符，您必须写入描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串字段大小超过指定值的字节`VBFixedString`属性将被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 所有将变量写入磁盘连续，也就是说，不带记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 不是元素的结构，无需两个字节的长度说明符写入可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数将数据写入到一个文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的五个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

span.span: Writing to Files in Visual Basic

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, string Value, long RecordNumber = -1, bool StringIsFixedLength = false);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, string Value, int64 RecordNumber, bool StringIsFixedLength) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As String, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1, Optional StringIsFixedLength As Boolean = false)
static member FilePut : int * string * int64 * bool -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效变量名，它包含写入磁盘的数据。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 开始写入处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节号（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

param.name: StringIsFixedLength
param.span: 仅在写入字符串时适用。

span.span: Applies only when writing a string.

param.span: 指定是否将字符串的双字节字符串长度说明符写入文件中。

span.span: Specifies whether to write a two-byte string length descriptor for the string to the file.

summary.span: 将变量中得数据写入磁盘文件中。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详情，请参阅。

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, Array Value, long RecordNumber = -1, bool ArrayIsDynamic = false, bool StringIsFixedLength = false);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, class System.Array Value, int64 RecordNumber, bool ArrayIsDynamic, bool StringIsFixedLength) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Array, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1, Optional ArrayIsDynamic As Boolean = false, Optional StringIsFixedLength As Boolean = false)
static member FilePut : int * Array * int64 * bool * bool -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效变量名，它包含写入磁盘的数据。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 开始写入处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节号（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

param.name: ArrayIsDynamic

span.span: Applies only when writing an array.

param.span: 指定是否将数组视为动态数组，以及是否写入用于描述字符串长度的数组说明符。

span.span: Specifies whether the array is to be treated as dynamic, and whether to write an array descriptor for the string that describes the length.

param.name: StringIsFixedLength
param.span: 仅在写入字符串时适用。

span.span: Applies only when writing a string.

param.span: 指定是否将字符串的双字节字符串长度说明符写入文件中。

span.span: Specifies whether to write a two-byte string length descriptor for the string to the file.

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详情，请参阅。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步的记录或后的最后一个字节`FileGet`或`FilePut`函数或指向的最后一个`Seek`编写函数。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是否将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数是不会写入长度说明符`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePut`，您只需使用相同`FileGet`，您必须确保该字符串将初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePut`将后续的记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能与任何颇有自信地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是一个字符串，`FilePut`将写入一个双字节说明符，包含字符串长度，然后写入该变量的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含一个数值类型的对象`FilePut`标识的两个字节写入`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，编写一个对象时包含一个整数`FilePut`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储在变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePut`写入一个双字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少大于字符串的实际长度为四个字节。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量是一个数组，则必须选择要写入大小和数组的维数的说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和早期版本编写的文件说明符有关的动态数组而不是固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，设置`ArrayIsDynamic`参数`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在编写数组时，必须匹配的方法将读取该数组;如果它将读取与描述符，您必须写入描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，以下数组声明需要 218 个字节时将数组写入到磁盘。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 （不可变长度字符串或对象）`FilePut`只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数必须是大于或等于写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 将元素的结构写入像分别，写入的每个元素之间没有空白的情况除外。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于字符串字段中的结构，以指示字符串写入时的大小到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字符串字段大小超过指定值的字节`VBFixedString`属性将被截断时写入到磁盘，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，大部分`Random`模式规则适用，有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中打开文件的以下规则`Binary`模式不同于为规则`Random`模式：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 所有将变量写入磁盘连续，也就是说，不带记录之间的填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于在结构中，数组以外的任何数组`FilePut`只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 未不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 不是元素的结构，无需两个字节的长度说明符写入可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，以下语句将 11 个字节写入文件号 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 通过使用对文件进行写入`FilePut`函数需要`Write`从访问枚举。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePut`函数将数据写入到一个文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 结构的五个记录`Person`写入到文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePutObject (int FileNumber, object Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePutObject(int32 FileNumber, object Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePutObject (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Object, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePutObject : int * obj * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效变量名，它包含写入磁盘的数据。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 开始写入处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节号（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 将变量中得数据写入磁盘文件中。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详情，请参阅。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePutObject`而不是使用函数`FilePut`以在编译时避免出现多义性，如果类型`Object`传递而不是另一种类型，如`Integer`， `Long`， `Short`，依次类推。The `FilePutObject` function is used instead of `FilePut` to avoid ambiguities at compile time if type `Object` is passed instead of another type, such as `Integer`, `Long`, `Short`, and so forth. `FilePutObject` 将写入和读取描述该对象的描述符。`FilePutObject` writes and reads descriptors that describe the object. 如果你想要将写出`Variant`类型，`FilePutObject`是必需的。If you intend to write out the `Variant` type, `FilePutObject` is required. 如果你使用某个对象作为第二个参数，如有疑问，我们建议始终使用`FilePutObject`和`FileGetObject`。When in doubt, if you are using an object for the second parameter, we recommend that you always use `FilePutObject` and `FileGetObject`. `FilePutObject` 仅在中有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePutObject` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGetObject` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePutObject` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePutObject` is usually read from a file by using `FileGetObject`. 第一个记录或文件中的字节位置 1，第二个记录或字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略`RecordNumber`，`FilePutObject`上次写入下一个记录或字节`FileGetObject`或`FilePutObject`函数 (或记录号或字节指向由最后一个`Seek`函数)。If you omit `RecordNumber`, `FilePutObject` writes the next record or byte after the last `FileGetObject` or `FilePutObject` function (or the record or byte pointed to by the last `Seek` function). `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是否将字符串解释为变量或固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePutObject` 当参数是不会写入长度说明符`True`。`FilePutObject` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`与`FilePutObject`，您只需使用相同`FileGetObject`，您必须还需确保该字符串将初始化为所需的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePutObject`, you have to do the same with `FileGetObject`, and you must also make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 有关在中打开文件`Random`模式下，下列规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，`FilePutObject`将后续的记录写入记录长度边界上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePutObject` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 用文件缓冲区的现有内容填充一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开始之间的空间。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能准确地确定填充的数据量，它通常是最好使记录的长度与写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be precisely determined, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于中指定的长度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函数，将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception is thrown. - 如果写入的变量是包含一个数值类型的对象`FilePutObject`标识的两个字节写入`VarType`的对象，然后将该变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePutObject` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，编写一个对象时包含一个整数`FilePutObject`写入 6 个字节： 标识作为对象的两个字节`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含的数据的四个字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePutObject` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少为两个字节大于实际存储在变量所需的字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是一个对象，包含一个字符串，`FilePutObject`写入一个双字节说明符标识`VarType(8)`的对象，然后。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePutObject` writes a two-byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 指定的记录长度`RecordLength`中的参数`FileOpen`函数必须至少大于字符串的实际长度为四个字节。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果你想要放入而无需描述符字符串，则应传递`True`到`StringIsFixedLength`参数，并应为正确的长度，读取到的字符串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量为数组，则 `RecordLength` 函数中 `FileOpen` 子句指定的记录长度必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。If the variable being written is an array, then the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 描述符指定秩的数组、 大小和为每个级别的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于 2 加上 8 倍的维度数：(2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 打开的文件中`Binary`模式下，所有`Random`模式规则适用，除外：For files opened in `Binary` mode, all the `Random` mode rules apply, except: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函数不起任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePutObject` 所有将变量写入磁盘连续，也就是说，不带记录之间的填充。`FilePutObject` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. ## Examples 此示例使用`FilePutObject`函数以将字符串写入文件。This example uses the `FilePutObject` function to write a string to a file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#54)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`FreeFile`提供尚未使用的文件号。Use `FreeFile` to supply a file number that is not already being used. ## Examples 此示例使用`FreeFile`函数以返回下一个可用的文件数。This example uses the `FreeFile` function to return the next available file number. 五个文件打开，以便在循环中，输出和一些示例数据写入到每个。Five files are opened for output within the loop, and some sample data is written to each.
