remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定设置了哪些属性，请使用`And`运算符执行返回的值的按位比较`GetAttr`函数和所需的各个文件属性的值。To determine which attributes are set, use the `And` operator to perform a bitwise comparison of the value returned by the `GetAttr` function and the value of the individual file attribute you want. 如果结果不为零，该属性设置为指定的文件。If the result is not zero, that attribute is set for the named file. 例如，下面的返回值`And`表达式是零个 if`Archive`未设置属性：For example, the return value of the following `And` expression is zero if the `Archive` attribute is not set: ```vb Result = GetAttr(FName) And vbArchive ``` 如果返回非零值`Archive`属性设置。A nonzero value is returned if the `Archive` attribute is set. ## Examples 此示例使用`GetAttr`函数来确定文件和目录或文件夹的属性。This example uses the `GetAttr` function to determine the attributes of a file and directory or folder. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#25)]

summary.span: 读取打开的顺序文件中的数据，并将这些数据赋值给变量。

span.span: Reads data from an open sequential file and assigns the data to variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Input`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `Input` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 访问文件](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 与读取的数据`Input`通常通过使用写入到文件`Write`。Data read with `Input` is usually written to a file by using `Write`. 此函数只能用于在打开的文件`Input`或`Binary`模式。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当从文件读取，不要确定基于文件扩展名的文件的内容。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 form1.vb 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 2005 源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic 2005 source file. 读取时，标准字符串或数值数据分配到无需修改的变量。When read, standard string or numeric data is assigned to variables without modification. 下表说明了如何处理其他输入的数据。The following table illustrates how other input data is treated. |数据Data|分配给变量的值Value assigned to variable| |-|-| |分隔逗号或空行Delimiting comma or blank line|空Empty| |#NULL##NULL#|`DBNull`| |#TRUE # 或 #FALSE ##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|日期和/或表达式表示的时间The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` （变量是对象标记为错误）`errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在输入数据项目时达到文件末尾，停止输入，并出现错误。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函数未进行本地化。The `Input` function is not localized. 例如，在德语版，如果输入 3,14159，它返回仅 3，因为逗号视为变量分隔符而不是作为小数点。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件中读取`Input`函数需要`Read`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Input`函数来从文件读取数据，到两个变量。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 此示例假定`TestFile`是一个文件，已使用对其写入数据的某些行`Write`函数，每行都包含在引用和由逗号分隔，例如一个数字的字符串: ("Hello"，234)。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has some lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#35)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Input`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `Input` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 访问文件](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 与读取的数据`Input`通常通过使用写入到文件`Write`。Data read with `Input` is usually written to a file by using `Write`. 此函数只能用于在打开的文件`Input`或`Binary`模式。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当从文件读取，不要确定基于文件扩展名的文件的内容。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 form1.vb 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 2005 源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic 2005 source file. 读取时，标准字符串或数值数据分配到无需修改的变量。When read, standard string or numeric data is assigned to variables without modification. 下表说明了如何处理其他输入的数据。The following table illustrates how other input data is treated. |数据Data|分配给变量的值Value assigned to variable| |-|-| |分隔逗号或空行Delimiting comma or blank line|空Empty| |#NULL##NULL#|`DBNull`| |#TRUE # 或 #FALSE ##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|日期和/或表达式表示的时间The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` （变量是对象标记为错误）`errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在输入数据项目时达到文件末尾，停止输入，并出现错误。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函数未进行本地化。The `Input` function is not localized. 例如，在德语版，如果输入 3,14159，它返回仅 3，因为逗号视为变量分隔符而不是作为小数点。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件中读取`Input`函数需要`Read`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Input`函数来从文件读取数据，到两个变量。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 此示例假定`TestFile`是一个文件，具有若干行的数据写入到该使用`Write`函数，每行都包含在引用和由逗号分隔，例如一个数字的字符串: ("Hello"，234)。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has several lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#35)]

或 #FALSE ##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|日期和/或表达式表示的时间The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` （变量是对象标记为错误）`errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在输入数据项目时达到文件末尾，停止输入，并出现错误。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函数未进行本地化。The `Input` function is not localized. 例如，在德语版，如果输入 3,14159，它返回仅 3，因为逗号视为变量分隔符而不是作为小数点。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件中读取`Input`函数需要`Read`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Input`函数来从文件读取数据，到两个变量。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 此示例假定`TestFile`是一个文件，具有若干行的数据写入到该使用`Write`函数，每行都包含在引用和由逗号分隔，例如一个数字的字符串: ("Hello"，234)。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has several lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#35)]

static member InputString : int * int -> string

param.name: CharCount
param.span: 用于指定要读取的字符数的任何有效数值表达式。

returns.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `InputString`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `InputString` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 访问文件](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 与读取的数据`InputString`函数通常通过使用写入到文件`Print`或`FilePut`。Data read with the `InputString` function is usually written to a file by using `Print` or `FilePut`. 此函数只能用于在打开的文件`Input`或`Binary`模式。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. 与不同`Input`函数，`InputString`函数将返回它所读取的所有字符。Unlike the `Input` function, the `InputString` function returns all the characters it reads. 这包括逗号、 回车符、 换行符、 引号和前导空格。This includes commas, carriage returns, line feeds, quotation marks, and leading spaces. 使用文件打开以进行`Binary`访问，请尝试使用通过文件读取`InputString`直到函数`EOF`返回`True`生成一个错误。With files opened for `Binary` access, an attempt to read through the file by using the `InputString` function until `EOF` returns `True` generates an error. 使用`LOF`并`Loc`函数而不是`EOF`通过读取二进制文件时`InputString`，或使用`FileGet`当你使用`EOF`函数。Use the `LOF` and `Loc` functions instead of `EOF` when you read binary files by using `InputString`, or use `FileGet` when you use the `EOF` function. > [!NOTE] > 当从文件读取，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的安全决策。When reading from files, do not make security decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 form1.vb 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 源文件。For example, a file named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## Examples 此示例使用`InputString`函数来从文件一次读取一个字符，并将其打印到`Output`窗口。This example uses the `InputString` function to read one character at a time from a file and print it to the `Output` window. 此示例假定`MyFile`是具有示例数据的多个行的文本文件。This example assumes that `MyFile` is a text file that has several lines of sample data. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#33)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Kill` 支持使用多个字符 (`*`) 和单字符 (`?`) 通配符来指定多个文件。`Kill` supports the use of multiple-character (`*`) and single-character (`?`) wildcards to specify multiple files. **安全说明**若要执行，`Kill`函数要求`Read`并`PathDiscovery`标志的要对其授予对执行代码。**Security Note** In order to execute, the `Kill` function requires `Read` and `PathDiscovery` flags of to be granted to the executing code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)For more information, see [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675) ## Examples 此示例使用`Kill`函数从磁盘中删除文件。This example uses the `Kill` function to delete a file from a disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#60](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#60)]

static member LineInput : int -> string

summary.span: 从打开的顺序文件中读取一行并将其赋值给一个 变量。

span.span: Reads a single line from an open sequential file and assigns it to a variable.

returns.span: 从打开的顺序文件中读取一行并将其赋值给一个 变量。

span.span: Reads a single line from an open sequential file and assigns it to a variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `LineInput`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `LineInput` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 访问文件](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 与读取的数据`LineInput`通常通过使用写入到文件`Print`。Data read with `LineInput` is usually written to a file by using `Print`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 时从文件读取，不要根据文件扩展名的文件的内容的决策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 form1.vb 的文件不可能的 Visual Basic 源代码文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. `LineInput`函数从文件中的一个字符读取一次直到它遇到回车符 (`Chr(13)`) 或回车符/换行符 (`Chr(13) + Chr(10)`) 序列。The `LineInput` function reads from a file one character at a time until it encounters a carriage return (`Chr(13)`) or carriage return/line feed (`Chr(13) + Chr(10)`) sequence. 回车/换行符序列将跳过而不是追加到字符字符串。Carriage return/line feed sequences are skipped instead of appended to the character string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过使用从文件中读取`LineInput`函数需要`Read`从访问枚举。Reading from a file by using the `LineInput` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用`LineInput`函数来从顺序文件中读取一行，并将其分配给一个变量。This example uses the `LineInput` function to read a line from a sequential file and assign it to a variable. 此示例假定`TestFile`是具有示例数据的多个行的文本文件。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a text file that has several lines of sample data. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#19)]

.method public static int64 Loc(int32 FileNumber) cil managed
Public Function Loc (FileNumber As Integer) As Long
public: static long Loc(int FileNumber);
static member Loc : int -> int64

param.name: FileNumber
param.span: 任何有效的 文件号。

summary.span: 返回指定打开文件中当前读/写位置的值。

span.span: Returns a value that specifies the current read/write position in an open file.

returns.span: 打开文件中当前读/写位置。

span.span: The current read/write position in an open file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Loc`函数是从零开始的使用它来检索文件中的第一个字节将返回 0。The `Loc` function is zero-based; using it to retrieve the first byte in a file will return 0. `Loc`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `Loc` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 访问文件](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 下面介绍每种文件访问模式的返回值：The following describes the return value for each file access mode: |模式Mode|返回值Return value| |-|-| |`Random`|读取或写入到文件中的最后一个记录的数目。Number of the last record read from or written to the file.| |`Sequential`|除以 128 文件中的当前字节位置。Current byte position in the file divided by 128. 但是，返回的信息`Loc`的顺序文件不是使用也不需要。However, information returned by `Loc` for sequential files is neither used nor required.| |`Binary`|读取或写入的最后一个字节的位置。Position of the last byte read or written.| ## Examples 此示例使用`Loc`函数以返回打开的文件中的当前读/写位置。This example uses the `Loc` function to return the current read/write position in an open file. 此示例假定`MyFile`是具有示例数据的多个行的文本文件。This example assumes that `MyFile` is a text file that has several lines of sample data. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#17)]

summary.span: 控制其他进程对使用 函数打开的文件的全部或部分的访问。

span.span: Controls access by other processes to all or part of a file opened by using the function.

summary.span: 与 和 相比， 功能在文件 I/O 操作方面可为您提供更高的效率和更好的性能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than and .

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Lock (int FileNumber);
.method public static void Lock(int32 FileNumber) cil managed
Public Sub Lock (FileNumber As Integer)
public: static void Lock(int FileNumber);
static member Lock : int -> unit

summary.span: 控制其他进程对使用 函数打开的文件的全部或部分的访问。

span.span: Controls access by other processes to all or part of a file opened by using the function.

summary.span: 与 和 相比， 功能在文件 I/O 操作方面可为您提供更高的效率和更好的性能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than and .

summary.span: 有关详情，请参阅。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Lock`和`Unlock`函数用于环境中的多个进程可能需要访问同一文件。The `Lock` and `Unlock` functions are used in environments where several processes might need access to the same file. `Lock` 和`Unlock`函数始终成对使用。`Lock` and `Unlock` functions are always used in pairs. 参数`Lock`和`Unlock`必须相同。The arguments to `Lock` and `Unlock` must be identical. 如果`Record`，或`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`是未提供，该锁将在整个文件。If `Record`, or `FromRecord` and `ToRecord` are not supplied, the lock will be for the whole file. 如果`Record`单独指定单个记录将锁定/解锁。If `Record` alone is specified the single record will be locked/unlocked. 如果已打开文件进行连续的输入或输出中，`Lock`并`Unlock`会影响整个文件，而不考虑指定的范围`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`。If the file has been opened for sequential input or output, `Lock` and `Unlock` affect the whole file, regardless of the range specified by `FromRecord` and`ToRecord`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`Lock`和`Unlock`函数。This example illustrates the use of the `Lock` and `Unlock` functions. 此示例假定`People.txt`是包含记录的结构的一个文件`Person`。This example assumes that `People.txt` is a file that contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#13)]

related.span: 使用 Visual Basic 访问文件

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Lock`和`Unlock`函数用于环境中的多个进程可能需要访问同一文件。The `Lock` and `Unlock` functions are used in environments where several processes might need access to the same file. `Lock` 和`Unlock`函数始终成对使用。`Lock` and `Unlock` functions are always used in pairs. 参数`Lock`和`Unlock`必须相同。The arguments to `Lock` and `Unlock` must be identical. 如果`Record`，或`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`是未提供，该锁将在整个文件。If `Record`, or `FromRecord` and `ToRecord` are not supplied, the lock will be for the whole file. 如果`Record`单独指定单个记录将锁定/解锁。If `Record` alone is specified the single record will be locked/unlocked. 如果已打开文件进行连续的输入或输出中，`Lock`并`Unlock`会影响整个文件，而不考虑指定的范围`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`。If the file has been opened for sequential input or output, `Lock` and `Unlock` affect the whole file, regardless of the range specified by `FromRecord` and`ToRecord`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`Lock`和`Unlock`函数。This example illustrates the use of the `Lock` and `Unlock` functions. 此示例假定`People.txt`是包含记录的结构的一个文件`Person`。This example assumes that `People.txt` is a file that contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#13)]

Public Sub Print (FileNumber As Integer, ParamArray Output As Object())

static member Print : int * obj[] -> unit

param.name: Output
param.span: 要写入文件的零个或多个由逗号分隔的表达式。

span.span: Zero or more comma-delimited expressions to write to a file.

summary.span: 将已设置显示格式的数据写入顺序文件。

span.span: Writes display-formatted data to a sequential file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Print`和`PrintLine`函数是为了向后兼容性，可能会影响性能。The `Print` and `PrintLine` functions are provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 访问文件](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). `Print` 不包括换行符末尾的行;但是，`PrintLine`包括换行符。`Print` does not include a line feed at the end of a line; however, `PrintLine` does include a line feed. 与写入的数据`Print`从文件通常通过使用读取`LineInput`或`Input`。Data written with `Print` is usually read from a file by using `LineInput` or `Input`. 如果省略`Output`有关`PrintLine`，该文件; 有关打印一个空行`Print`，没有输出。If you omit `Output` for `PrintLine`, a blank line is printed to the file; for `Print`, nothing is output. 用逗号分隔的多个表达式将对齐选项卡边界，但混合使用逗号和`TAB`可能会导致不一致的结果。Multiple expressions separated with a comma will be aligned on tab boundaries, but mixing commas and `TAB` may cause inconsistent results. 有关`Boolean`数据，而是`True`或`False`打印。For `Boolean` data, either `True` or `False` is printed. `True`和`False`不转换关键字，而不考虑区域设置。The `True` and `False` keywords are not translated, regardless of the locale. 日期数据写入该文件使用您的系统所识别的标准的短日期格式。Date data is written to the file by using the standard short date format recognized by your system. 当日期或时间部分缺失或为零时，仅提供部分写入文件。When either the date or the time component is missing or zero, only the part provided is written to the file. 执行任何操作写入到文件，如果`Output`数据为空。Nothing is written to the file if `Output` data is empty. 但是，如果`Output`列表中的数据`DBNull`，`Null`写入到文件。However, if `Output` list data is `DBNull`, `Null` is written to the file. 有关`Error`数据，输出将显示为`Error errorcode`。For `Error` data, the output appears as `Error errorcode`. `Error`关键字不会转换而不考虑区域设置。The `Error` keyword is not translated regardless of the locale. 通过使用写入到文件的所有数据`Print`是国际上通用的; 即，数据的正确格式使用相应的小数分隔符。All data written to the file by using `Print` is internationally aware; that is, the data is correctly formatted using the appropriate decimal separator. 如果用户想要输出以供多个区域设置数据`Write`应使用。If the user wishes to output data for use by multiple locales, `Write` should be used. 通过使用对文件进行写入`Print`或`PrintLine`函数要求`Write`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举。Writing to a file by using the `Print` or `PrintLine` functions requires `Write` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关更多信息，请参见。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Print`和`PrintLine`函数将数据写入到一个文件。This example uses the `Print` and `PrintLine` functions to write data to a file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#53](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#53)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Rename`函数重命名文件，并将其移动到另一个目录，如有必要。The`Rename` function renames a file and moves it to a different directory, if it is required. `Rename`函数可以将一个文件，在驱动器，但它只能重命名现有目录时同时`NewPath`和`OldPath`位于同一驱动器上。The `Rename` function can move a file across drives, but it can only rename an existing directory when both `NewPath` and `OldPath` are located on the same drive. `Rename` 无法创建新文件或目录。`Rename` cannot create a new file or directory. 使用`Rename`函数对打开的文件会产生错误。Using the `Rename` function on an open file produces an error. 重命名之前，必须关闭打开的文件。You must close an open file before renaming it. `Rename` 参数不能包含多个字符 （\*） 和单字符 （？） 通配符。`Rename` arguments cannot include multiple-character (\*) and single-character (?) wildcards. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当使用`Rename`将文件从受保护的位置复制到受保护的位置，则文件，将保留不太受限制的权限。When using `Rename` to copy a file from an unprotected location to a protected location, the file retains the less restricted rights. 检查以确保没有引入可能的安全风险。Check to make sure that you are not introducing a possible security risk. ## Examples 此示例使用`Rename`函数重命名文件。This example uses the `Rename` function to rename a file. 对于此示例中，假定已指定的目录存在。For purposes of this example, assume that the directories that are specified already exist. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#30)]

exception.span: 无法重命名为不同的设备。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Reset`函数将关闭打开的所有活动文件`FileOpen`函数，并具有相同的功能`FileClose()`不带任何参数。The `Reset` function closes all active files opened by the `FileOpen` function and has the same function as `FileClose()` without any parameters. ## Examples 此示例使用`Reset`函数来关闭所有打开的文件，并将所有文件缓冲区的内容写入到磁盘。This example uses the `Reset` function to close all open files and write the contents of all file buffers to disk. 请注意，使用`Object`变量`FileNumber`作为一个字符串和数字。Note the use of the `Object` variable `FileNumber` as both a string and a number. public: static long Seek(int FileNumber);
static member Seek : int -> int64

param.name: FileNumber
param.span: 一个包含有效文件号的 。

span.span: An that contains a valid file number.

summary.span: 返回 ，它指定使用 函数打开的文件中的当前读/写位置；或设置使用 函数打开的文件中的下一个读/写操作的位置。

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

summary.span: 有关详情，请参阅。

returns.span: 一个 ，它指定使用 函数打开的文件中的当前读/写位置；或设置使用 函数打开的文件中的下一个读/写操作的位置。

span.span: A specifying the current read/write position in a file opened by using the function, or sets the position for the next read/write operation in a file opened by using the function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Seek` 返回 1 和 2,147,483,647 之间的值 (等效于 2 ^31-1)，非独占。`Seek` returns a value between 1 and 2,147,483,647 (equivalent to 2^31 - 1), inclusive. 下面介绍每个文件访问模式的返回的值：The following describes the return values for each file access mode: |模式Mode|返回值Return Value| |-|-| |`Random`|读取或写入的下一个记录的数目Number of the next record read or written| |`Binary`, `Input`, `Output`, `Append``Binary`, `Input`, `Output`, `Append`|下一步操作发生的字节位置。Byte position at which the next operation occurs. 在文件中的第一个字节位于位置 1，第二个字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first byte in a file is at position 1, the second byte is at position 2, and so on.| ## Examples 此示例使用`Seek`函数以返回当前文件位置。This example uses the `Seek` function to return the current file position. 该示例假定`TestFile`是包含记录的结构的一个文件`Record`。The example assumes `TestFile` is a file that contains records of the structure `Record`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#47](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#47)] 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，`Seek`返回下一条记录的数目。For files opened in `Random` mode, `Seek` returns the number of next record. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#48)] 而不在模式下打开的文件`Random`模式下，`Seek`返回下一步操作发生的字节位置。For files opened in modes other than `Random` mode, `Seek` returns the byte position at which the next operation occurs. 假定`TestFile`是包含若干行文本的文件。Assume `TestFile` is a file that contains several lines of text. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#49)] 此示例使用`Seek`函数将位置设置为下一次读取或写入的文件中。This example uses the `Seek` function to set the position for the next read or write in a file. 而不在模式下打开的文件`Random`模式下，`Seek`设置下一步操作发生的字节位置。For files opened in modes other than `Random` mode, `Seek` sets the byte position at which the next operation occurs. 假定`TestFile`是包含若干行文本的文件。Assume `TestFile` is a file that contains several lines of text. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#52](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#52)]

param.name: FileNumber
param.span: 一个包含有效文件号的 。

span.span: An that contains a valid file number.

param.name: Position
param.span: 一个 1 到 2,147,483,647 范围内（包括 1 和 2,147,483,647）的数字，用于指示下一个读取/写入操作应该发生的位置。

span.span: Number in the range 1-2,147,483,647, inclusive, that indicates where the next read/write operation should occur.

summary.span: 返回 ，它指定使用 函数打开的文件中的当前读/写位置；或设置使用 函数打开的文件中的下一个读/写操作的位置。

span.span: Returns a specifying the current read/write position in a file opened by using the function, or sets the position for the next read/write operation in a file opened by using the function.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Seek` 返回 1 和 2,147,483,647 之间的值 (等效于 2 ^31-1)，非独占。`Seek` returns a value between 1 and 2,147,483,647 (equivalent to 2^31 - 1), inclusive. 下面介绍每个文件访问模式的返回的值：The following describes the return values for each file access mode: |模式Mode|返回值Return Value| |-|-| |`Random`|读取或写入的下一个记录的数目Number of the next record read or written| |`Binary`, `Input`, `Output`, `Append``Binary`, `Input`, `Output`, `Append`|下一步操作发生的字节位置。Byte position at which the next operation occurs. 在文件中的第一个字节位于位置 1，第二个字节在位置 2，依此类推。The first byte in a file is at position 1, the second byte is at position 2, and so on.| ## Examples 此示例使用`Seek`函数以返回当前文件位置。This example uses the `Seek` function to return the current file position. 该示例假定`TestFile`是包含记录的结构的一个文件`Record`。The example assumes `TestFile` is a file that contains records of the structure `Record`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#47](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#47)] 打开的文件中`Random`模式下，`Seek`返回下一条记录的数目。For files opened in `Random` mode, `Seek` returns the number of next record. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#48)] 而不在模式下打开的文件`Random`模式下，`Seek`返回下一步操作发生的字节位置。For files opened in modes other than `Random` mode, `Seek` returns the byte position at which the next operation occurs. 假定`TestFile`是包含若干行文本的文件。Assume `TestFile` is a file that contains several lines of text. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#49)] 此示例使用`Seek`函数将位置设置为下一次读取或写入的文件中。This example uses the `Seek` function to set the position for the next read or write in a file. 而不在模式下打开的文件`Random`模式下，`Seek`设置下一步操作发生的字节位置。For files opened in modes other than `Random` mode, `Seek` sets the byte position at which the next operation occurs. 假定`TestFile`是包含若干行文本的文件。Assume `TestFile` is a file that contains several lines of text. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#52](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#52)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您尝试设置打开的文件的属性，会发生运行时错误。A run-time error occurs if you try to set the attributes of an open file. `Attributes`参数枚举值如下所示：The `Attributes` argument enumeration values are as follows: |值Value|返回的常量Constant|描述Description| |-|-|-| |`Normal`|`vbNormal`|正常 （默认值）。Normal (default).| |`ReadOnly`|`vbReadOnly`|只读。Read-only.| |`Hidden`|`vbHidden`|隐藏。Hidden.| |`System`|`vbSystem`|系统文件。System file.| |`Volume`|`vbVolume`|卷标Volume label| |`Directory`|`vbDirectory`|目录或文件夹。Directory or folder.| |`Archive`|`vbArchive`|文件自上次备份后已更改。File has changed since last backup.| |`Alias`|`vbAlias`|文件具有不同的名称。File has a different name.| > [!NOTE] > 这些枚举是由 Visual Basic 语言指定的。These enumerations are specified by the Visual Basic language. 名称可以是任意位置在代码中使用而不是实际值。The names can be used anywhere in your code instead of the actual values. ## Examples 此示例使用`SetAttr`函数设置的文件的属性。This example uses the `SetAttr` function to set attributes for a file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#14)]

Public Function SPC (Count As Short) As SpcInfo
public: static Microsoft::VisualBasic::SpcInfo SPC(short Count);
static member SPC : int16 -> Microsoft.VisualBasic.SpcInfo

param.name: Count
param.span: 在显示或输出列表中下一个表达式之前要插入的空格数。

span.span: The number of spaces to insert before displaying or printing the next expression in a list.

summary.span: 与 或 函数一起使用以定位输出。

span.span: Used with the or function to position output.

returns.span: 与 或 函数一起使用以定位输出。

span.span: Used with the or function to position output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Count`小于输出行宽下, 一个输出位置立即遵循打印的空格数。If `Count` is less than the output line width, the next print position immediately follows the number of spaces printed. 如果`Count`大于输出行宽，`SPC`计算使用的公式的下一步打印位置：If`Count` is greater than the output line width, `SPC` calculates the next print position using the formula: `currentprintposition`(+(`Count``Mod``width`))`currentprintposition`(+(`Count``Mod``width`)) 例如，如果当前输出位置为 24，输出行的宽度为 80，并指定`SPC(90)`下, 一步的输出将从开始位置 34 （当前打印位置 + 90/80 的其余部分）。For example, if the current print position is 24, the output line width is 80, and you specify `SPC(90)`, the next print will start at position 34 (current print position + the remainder of 90/80). 如果当前的输出位置和输出行宽度之间的区别是小于`Count`(或`Count` `Mod` *宽度*)，则`SPC`函数将跳至下一行，并生成空间等于`Count`-(*宽度* - *小于*)。If the difference between the current print position and the output line width is less than `Count` (or `Count` `Mod` *width*), the `SPC` function skips to the start of the next line and generates spaces equal to `Count` - (*width* - *currentprintposition*). > [!NOTE] > 请确保表格列的宽度足以允许较宽的字母。Make sure your tabular columns are wide enough to allow for wide letters. ## Examples 此示例使用`SPC`函数以定位输出文件中并在**输出**窗口。This example uses the `SPC` function to position output in a file and in the **Output** window. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.VisualBasic.TabInfo TAB ();
.method public static valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.TabInfo TAB() cil managed
Public Function TAB () As TabInfo
public: static Microsoft::VisualBasic::TabInfo TAB();
static member TAB : unit -> Microsoft.VisualBasic.TabInfo

summary.span: 与 或 函数一起使用以定位输出。

span.span: Used with the or functions to position output.

returns.span: 与 或 函数一起使用以定位输出。

span.span: Used with the or functions to position output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前行上的当前打印位置大于`Column`，`TAB`将跳到列的值等于`Column`下一步的输出行上。If the current print position on the current line is larger than `Column`, `TAB` skips to the column value equal to `Column` on the next output line. 如果`Column`小于 1，`TAB`将打印位置移动到第 1 列。If `Column` is less than 1, `TAB` moves the print position to column 1. 如果`Column`大于输出行宽，`TAB`计算使用的公式的下一步打印位置：If `Column` is larger than the output line width, `TAB` calculates the next print position using the formula: Mod 列宽Column Mod width 例如，如果*宽度*是 80，并指定`TAB(90)`下, 一步的输出将从开始第 10 （90/80 的余数） 列。For example, if *width* is 80 and you specify `TAB(90)`, the next print will start at column 10 (the remainder of 90/80). 如果`Column`小于当前打印位置，开始计算的输出位置的下一行上。If `Column` is less than the current print position, printing starts on the next line at the calculated print position. 如果计算出的打印位置大于当前打印位置，打印开始计算打印位置在同一行。If the calculated print position is larger than the current print position, printing starts at the calculated print position on the same line. 输出行上最左侧的打印位置始终为 1。The leftmost print position on an output line is always 1. 当你使用`Print`或`PrintLine`函数来打印到文件，右侧的输出位置是输出文件，您可以使用设置的当前宽度`FileWidth`函数。When you use the `Print` or `PrintLine` functions to print to files, the rightmost print position is the current width of the output file, which you can set using the `FileWidth` function. `TAB`函数也可以用于`WriteLine`函数。The `TAB` function can also be used with the `WriteLine` function. 它不能用于或。It cannot be used with or . > [!NOTE] > 请确保表格列的宽度足以包含较宽的字母。Make sure your tabular columns are wide enough to contain wide letters. ## Examples 此示例使用`TAB`函数以定位输出文件中并在**输出**窗口。This example uses the `TAB` function to position output in a file and in the **Output** window. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#37)]

summary.span: 控制其他进程对使用 函数打开的文件的全部或部分的访问。

span.span: Controls access by other processes to all or part of a file opened by using the function.

summary.span: 与 和 相比， 功能在文件 I/O 操作方面可为您提供更高的效率和更好的性能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than and .

summary.span: 有关详情，请参阅。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Lock`和`Unlock`函数用于环境中的多个进程可能需要访问同一文件。The `Lock` and `Unlock` functions are used in environments where several processes might need access to the same file. `Lock` 和`Unlock`函数始终成对使用。`Lock` and `Unlock` functions are always used in pairs. 参数`Lock`和`Unlock`必须相同。The arguments to `Lock` and `Unlock` must be identical. 如果`Record`，或`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`是未提供，该锁将在整个文件。If `Record`, or `FromRecord` and `ToRecord` are not supplied, the lock will be for the whole file. 如果`Record`单独指定单个记录将锁定/解锁。If `Record` alone is specified the single record will be locked/unlocked. 如果已打开文件进行连续的输入或输出中，`Lock`并`Unlock`会影响整个文件，而不考虑指定的范围`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`。If the file has been opened for sequential input or output, `Lock` and `Unlock` affect the whole file, regardless of the range specified by `FromRecord` and`ToRecord`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`Lock`和`Unlock`函数。This example illustrates the use of the `Lock` and `Unlock` functions. 此示例假定`People.txt`是包含记录的结构的一个文件`Person`。This example assumes that `People.txt` is a file that contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#13)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Lock`和`Unlock`函数用于环境中的多个进程可能需要访问同一文件。The `Lock` and `Unlock` functions are used in environments where several processes might need access to the same file. `Lock` 和`Unlock`函数始终成对使用。`Lock` and `Unlock` functions are always used in pairs. 参数`Lock`和`Unlock`必须相同。The arguments to `Lock` and `Unlock` must be identical. 如果`Record`，或`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`是未提供，该锁将在整个文件。If `Record`, or `FromRecord` and `ToRecord` are not supplied, the lock will be for the whole file. 如果`Record`单独指定单个记录将锁定/解锁。If `Record` alone is specified the single record will be locked/unlocked. 如果已打开文件进行连续的输入或输出中，`Lock`并`Unlock`会影响整个文件，而不考虑指定的范围`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`。If the file has been opened for sequential input or output, `Lock` and `Unlock` affect the whole file, regardless of the range specified by `FromRecord` and`ToRecord`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`Lock`和`Unlock`函数。This example illustrates the use of the `Lock` and `Unlock` functions. 此示例假定`People.txt`是包含记录的结构的一个文件`Person`。This example assumes that `People.txt` is a file that contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#13)]

related.span: 使用 Visual Basic 访问文件

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Write (int FileNumber, params object[] Output);
.method public static void Write(int32 FileNumber, object[] Output) cil managed
Public Sub Write (FileNumber As Integer, ParamArray Output As Object())
public: static void Write(int FileNumber, ... cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ Output);
static member Write : int * obj[] -> unit

param.name: FileNumber
param.span: 包含任何有效文件数的 表达式。

span.span: An expression that contains any valid file number.

param.name: Output
param.span: 要写入文件的一个或多个由逗号分隔的表达式。

span.span: One or more comma-delimited expressions to write to a file.

summary.span: 将数据写入一个顺序文件。

span.span: Writes data to a sequential file.

summary.span: 通常使用 从文件中读取使用 编写的数据。

span.span: Data written with is usually read from a file by using .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Write`和`WriteLine`函数是为了向后兼容性，可能会影响性能。The `Write` and `WriteLine` functions are provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序，`My.Computer.FileSystem`对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Visual Basic 访问文件](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 如果省略`Output`，向文件打印一个空行。If you omit `Output`, a blank line is printed to the file. 可以用逗号分隔多个表达式。Multiple expressions can be separated with a comma. 与不同`Print`函数，`Write`函数之间插入逗号项和引号将字符串写入该文件。Unlike the `Print` function, the `Write` function inserts commas between items and quotation marks around strings as they are written to the file. 无需显式分隔符放入列表。You do not have to put explicit delimiters in the list. 当`Write`用于将数据写入到文件中，仅数字`Boolean`，日期、 null 和`Error`支持数据格式。When `Write` is used to write data to a file, only numeric, `Boolean`, date, null, and `Error` data formats are supported. 下面的通用假设遵循这样的数据始终能够阅读和正确解释使用`Input`，无论区域设置：The following universal assumptions are followed so the data can always be read and correctly interpreted using `Input`, regardless of locale: - 使用句点作为小数分隔符始终写入数值数据。Numeric data is always written using the period as the decimal separator. - 有关`Boolean`数据，而是`#TRUE#`或`#FALSE#`打印。For `Boolean` data, either `#TRUE#` or `#FALSE#` is printed. `True`和`False`不转换关键字，而不考虑区域设置。The `True` and `False` keywords are not translated, regardless of locale. - 日期数据写入到使用通用日期格式的文件。Date data is written to the file using the universal date format. 当日期或时间部分缺失或为零时，仅提供部分写入文件。When either the date or the time component is missing or zero, only the part provided is written to the file. - 执行任何操作写入到文件，如果`Output`数据为空。Nothing is written to the file if `Output` data is empty. 但是，对于 null 数据`#NULL#`写入。However, for null data, `#NULL#` is written. - 有关`Error`数据，输出将显示为`#ERROR errorcode#`。For `Error` data, the output appears as `#ERROR errorcode#`. `Error`不转换关键字，而不考虑区域设置。The `Error` keyword is not translated, regardless of locale. `WriteLine` 将插入一个换行符 (即回车符/换行符，或`Chr(13) + Chr(10)`)，在其写入的最后一个字符后`Output`的文件。`WriteLine` inserts a newline character (that is, a carriage return/line feed, or `Chr(13) + Chr(10)`), after it has written the final character in `Output` to the file. 您可以通过使用双引号引起来，在字符串中嵌入引号或""。You can embed quotation marks in a string by using double quotation marks, or "". 例如，应用于对象的For example, [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#63](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#63)] 返回一个字符串值为`Double quotation marks aren't "difficult" to handle`。returns a string with the value of `Double quotation marks aren't "difficult" to handle`. 通过使用对文件进行写入`Write`或`WriteLine`函数要求`Append`从访问`FileIOPermissionAccess`枚举。Writing to a file by using the `Write` or `WriteLine` functions requires `Append` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关更多信息，请参见。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Write`函数将原始数据写入顺序文件。This example uses the `Write` function to write raw data to a sequential file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#64](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#64)]
